mapper.insert: INSERT INTO items (item_type, name, detail, price, img, remain_count) VALUES (seq_items.NEXTVAL,#{item_type},#{name},#{detail},#{price},#{img},#{remain_count})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT result1.*, ROWNUM AS rnum FROM (SELECT item_type, item_num, name, detail, price, regdate, remain_count FROM items ORDER BY item_num DESC) result1) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{pageBegin} AND #{pageEnd}
